snippet: Researchers are trying to determine whether medical abortions can be done safely through an online consultation with a doctor and drugs shipped to a woman’s home....
abstract: Nonprofit research group Gynuity Health Projects conducts study in four states to determine whether women can safely conduct their own medical abortions by consulting with doctor online and receiving drugs via overnight mail; hopes to provide options for terminating pregnancy at time when access to abortion is increasingly restricted.
lead_paragraph: Researchers are trying to determine whether medical abortions can be done safely through an online consultation with a doctor and drugs shipped to a woman’s home.

headline.main: A Study Tests the Safety of Women Using Abortion Pills Sent by Mail
headline.print_headline: Study for Women Seeking Abortions Turns to an Old Technology: Mail
